title: Amazon and Meta are among the corporate sponsors of the White House Easter Egg Roll
summary: For the first time ever, the White House is selling corporate sponsorships for the Easter Egg Roll, ranging from $75,000 to $200,000
description: For the first time ever, the White House is selling corporate sponsorships for the Easter Egg Roll, ranging from $75,000 to $200,000
